mapper.select: /* CIInfraMapper.getListUserKey, 회원키 리스트 조회, 반범진, 2014-10-08*/ SELECT USERMBR_NO AS imMbrNo, INSD_USERMBR_NO AS userKey, MBR_CLAS_CD AS userType, PROC_DT AS lastTime FROM SPMBR.TB_US_CIINFRA_USERMBR WHERE SEARCH_TYPE = #{searchType} AND PROC_DAY = #{searchDay}

/* CIInfraMapper.getUserDetailInfo, 사용자 정보 상세 조회, 반범진, 2014-10-08*/ SELECT MBR_ID AS userId, USERMBR_NO AS imMbrNo, INSD_USERMBR_NO AS userKey, TEL_NO AS phone, MBR_NM AS name, BIRTH AS birth, SEX AS sex, CI AS ci, DI AS di, TO_CHAR(AUTH_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS lastTime, '' AS mdn FROM ( SELECT A.MBR_ID, A.USERMBR_NO, A.INSD_USERMBR_NO, A.TEL_NO, B.MBR_NM, B.BIRTH, B.SEX, B.CI, B.DI, B.AUTH_DT FROM (SELECT MBR_ID, USERMBR_NO, INSD_USERMBR_NO, TEL_NO FROM SPMBR.TB_US_USERMBR WHERE TENANT_ID = #{commonRequest.tenantID} AND INTG_SVC_NO = #{key} AND INSD_USERMBR_NO = #{key} AND MBR_ID = #{key} AND MBR_STATUS_MAIN_CD = 'US010201' AND MBR_CLAS_CD = 'US011503') A LEFT JOIN SPMBR.TB_US_MBR_AUTH B ON A.INSD_USERMBR_NO = B.INSD_USERMBR_NO ORDER BY B.AUTH_SEQ DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
